item.title:
Elle Fanning & Christopher Abbott to star in Sarah Elizabeth Mintz’s daring feature ‘THE MAID OF ORLEANS’.
It follows Rebecca Spielman, a young film school graduate who travels to Paris to work as the assistant to brilliant, yet tortured up-and-coming director Sammy Lindberg.
item.author: FilmUpdates
